name: stock-chart-app
description: A real-time chart of active stocks, modifiable from any user via Websockets

scripts.install-build-dependancies: npm install babel-loader cheerio css-loader dotenv extract-text-webpack-plugin file-loader mobx-react-devtools node-sass npm-run-all react-svg-loader rimraf sass-loader style-loader url-loader webpack webpack-dev-middleware
scripts.uninstall-build-dependancies: npm uninstall babel-loader cheerio css-loader dotenv extract-text-webpack-plugin file-loader mobx-react-devtools node-sass npm-run-all react-svg-loader rimraf sass-loader style-loader url-loader webpack webpack-dev-middleware
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-build-dependancies && npm run build && npm run uninstall-build-dependancies

author: megaboy101
